casebody.data:
John DePino v. Unger’s Floor Covering, Inc. (4128)

Borden, Daly and Bieluch, Js.

Argued October 17 decision released October 21, 1986 John DePino, pro se, the appellant (plaintiff). Richard F. Connors, for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

We have carefully reviewed the record and the plaintiff’s claims in this matter and find them to be without merit.

There is no error.
